column4: I'm running Feisty and need a program that will import digital certificates from my smart card, in order to be able to check my company email over the web.  Does anyone know where I can find something like this?

I'm running Feisty and need a program that will import digital certificates from my smart card, in order to be able to check my company email over the web.  Does anyone know where I can find something like this?
You will need to see if your smart card hardware is supported
yOU CANT DO MUCH UNTIL YOU KNOW ABOUT THE HARDWARE AND WORK FROM THERE
